mapper.select: SELECT s.ID id, s.USER_ID userId, s.GOODS_ID goodsId, s.STORE_ID storeId, g.GOODS_NEW_PRICE goodsPrice, s.GOODS_COUNT goodsCount, s.UPDATE_TIME updateTime FROM gm_shopping_trolley s,gm_goods g where s.GOODS_COUNT>0 and s.USER_ID=#{userId} AND s.GOODS_ID=g.ID order by s.STORE_ID , s.UPDATE_TIME desc
